Text:
Fantastic Sound.  Now i just need to upgrade my PC speakers.

Thanks!

One of the most audiophile flacs i have ever seen here on pirate bay. My pc speakers were singing and believe me they are quite expensive....
insinuendo thank you very much and if please keep up the good (audiophile) work.

A sound engineer from Greece

The 2M line from Ortofon is outstanding. I have the blue on a backup table. I like everything in the lineup cept the DD turntable.  No, no, no direct drives please.  You want it audiophile, you need a belt drive table.  Check into audio asylum for more info. Thanks for the effort and upload though...
Who cares what equipement you have - excellent upload - thanks
